sentences.en: Arriving at Bewlie's farm, he called for the laborer in charge of the sick cow.
sentences.cn: 他来到了比尤利的农场, 把看管病牛的工人找了来.

sentences.en: Basically, in 2009, the life of a wage laborer has the same essential features in every corner of the globe.
sentences.cn: 在2009年，工资劳动者的生活，其基本特征在全球的各个角落都是大致相同的。

sentences.en: Does laborer work overtime by what standard should pay salary?
sentences.cn: 劳动者加班加点应按什么标准支付工资?

sentences.en: Encouraged by this discovery, Edmond determined to assist the indefatigable laborer.
sentences.cn: 在这个发现的鼓舞之下, 爱德蒙决心要帮助那个不屈不挠的劳动者.

sentences.en: Form by the element as tool of laborer, labor.
sentences.cn: 是由劳动者 、 劳动工具等因素构成的.

sentences.en: He worked his way through university as a day laborer.
sentences.cn: 他做白天打工赚钱读完大学.

sentences.en: His hands were embrowned like those of a common laborer.
sentences.cn: 他的一双手象农场工人的手那样是古铜色的.

sentences.en: I used to be a laborer in a liquor warehouse.
sentences.cn: 我曾经是一位酒仓库的小工.

sentences.en: Indemnity can be deducted from the salary of laborer.
sentences.cn: 赔偿金额可以从劳动者的工资扣除.

sentences.en: It is no use offering the manual laborer, tired out with a hard week’s sweat and effort, the chance of playing a game of football or baseball on Saturday afternoon.
sentences.cn: 对于那些体力劳动者来说，一周辛苦的工作使他们精疾力竭，因此在周六下午给他们提供踢足球或者打棒球的机会是没有意义的。

sentences.en: Laborer is worthy of his hire.
Look at Jimmy Bradock, down to being a day laborer.
sentences.cn: 瞧瞧杰米·布拉多克,已经落魄到做临时工的地步了.

sentences.en: The laBorer is worthy of his hire.
The laborer's appetite works for him; his hunger drives him on.
sentences.cn: 劳力人的胃口,使他劳力, 因为他的口腹催逼他.

sentences.en: The merchant could only pay the laborer in driblets.
sentences.cn: 那商人只能零星地付给那工人工钱.

sentences.en: The peasant laborer is in our country modernization advancement inevitable product.
sentences.cn: 农民工是我国现代化进程中的必然产物.

sentences.en: Trade union has some irreplaceable advantages in protecting the Laborer's legaland interests.
sentences.cn: 工会在维护劳动者权益方面具有不可替代的优势作用.

sentences.en: Traditionally cut blue jeans carry a whiff of the laborer about them, so denim on a leader suggests a willingness to roll up the sleeves and dig in.
sentences.cn: 传统剪裁的蓝色牛仔裤带有一种劳动者的气息，因此领导者穿着仔裤可以表达一种愿意卷起袖子大干一场的意思。

words.tran_cn: 吃力的；费劲的；不自然的
工作；劳动；分娩（labor的过去分词）
劳动；努力；为…所苦恼；艰难地行进（labour的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 体力劳动者，工人，（熟练工人的）辅助工
